actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that any additional revenues resulting from the imposition of, or any change in, any tax or fee should be applied to reducing our Nation's public debt.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that revenues resulting from the imposition of, or any change in, any tax or fee should be applied to reducing the public debt.

titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that any additional revenues resulting from the imposition of, or any change in, any tax or fee should be applied to reducing our Nation's public debt.
